attributes.action: dissolve Parliament so that the electorate can decide which MPs have the moral standing to continue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses claims scandal has left this Parliament with no moral authority to govern.  An immediate general election would give the electorate the chance to pass collective judgement over this behaviour and select individual MPs who could start to rebuild trust.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
